name: Personal Website
description:
Personal website build with the modern static site builder Astro.
Astro allows me use other libraries or frameworks like React or Vue on top of it but it generates the website with zero client-side JavaScript, by default.
However, Astro can hydrate individual components and leave the rest of your site as static HTML.
